name: Tower Defence - Return of the Purple Blob
name_original: Tower Defence - Return of the Purple Blob
description:
A game made in 48 hours for the Mix and Game Jam 2020.

A Tower Defence / Strategy game.

Defend your tower agains waves of purple blobs.

You will unlock new turrets every few rounds, and the number of evil purple blobs will multiply each wave.

Be sure to plan your defence as when you die, you start all over.

Click and drag your turrets to place them where you would like.

You may restart any wave - but beware, if you restart, your turret will not regain health.

You will be able to use some basic guns which deal small damage, but also heavy artillery units which will be sure to eliminate swarms of enemies in one shot.

I hope you enjoy
